connect20/cadence_fbpixel.name: connect20/cadence_fbpixel

suggest.magento-hackathon/magento-composer-insta: Allows to manage this package as a dependency

connect20/cadence_fbpixel.description: This extension allows you to quickly implement Facebook tracking and conversion code on your Magento store. Supports Visitor Tracking and Conversion (Checkout) Pixels

connect20/cadence_fbpixel.description: This extension allows you to quickly implement Facebook tracking and conversion code on your Magento store. Supports Visitor and Purchase tracking events through the Facebook pixel
